name: Float Gallery
description: Float Gallery shows the work of artists working in the digital realm and supports aesthetic and cultural practice in virtual environments. By nature, we define ourselves as a global endeavor, resolving boarders and blending realities in the search of new forms of being, discourse and organization.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTC 980 (VR ready) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTC 980 (VR ready) DirectX: Version 11
